channel.title: [NEW] Epic's V1 or Epicscape! 5100 + Views ! 480+ Dl's @!@[NEW]
channel.description:
[size=26pt]yay :)[/size]
[size=16pt]Epicscape V1[/size]
http://files.filefront.com/Epics+V1rar/;12188721;/
http://files.filefront.com/Epics+V1rar/;12188721;/
My first server and its pretty good
100% customly coded by Elvemage 0o
Some Features
[ul][li]Working Ancients[/li] [li]Working Teleport Portals[/li] [li]Working tele-block[/li] [li]Working Playerban System[/li] [li]Comes with working compiler[/li] [li]Comes with working char deleter[/li] [li]Working ipban system[/li] [li]All teletabs work[/li] [li]Has player/Mod/Admin/Owner commands[/li][/ul]
Player Commands
Player commands
::starter ::home ::wc ::yell ::food ::smith ::skills ::rep ::afk ::back ::gsmini ::suggest
_-_-_-_-_-_-__-_-_-_-_-_-__-_-_-_-_-_-__-_-_-_-_-_-_
Mod commands + all commands above
::kick ::notedbarrows ::az ::pure ::god ::alert ::sit ::m ::sweet ::mypk ::alert
_-_-_-_-_-_-__-_-_-_-_-_-__-_-_-_-_-_-__-_-_-_-_-_-_
Admin commands + all commands above
::banuser ::unban ::pnpc ::pickup ::npc ::xteleto ::xteletome ::k0 ::xrichie ::god
_-_-_-_-_-_-__-_-_-_-_-_-__-_-_-_-_-_-__-_-_-_-_-_-_
Owner commands + all commands above
::ipban ::getpass ::setlvls ::eat ::update ::giveadmin ::givemod ::demote
_-_-_-_-_-_-__-_-_-_-_-_-__-_-_-_-_-_-__-_-_-_-_-_-_
http://files.filefront.com/Epics+V1rar/;12188721;/
http://files.filefront.com/Epics+V1rar/;12188721;/
Some Pictures:
Home Area:
[IMG]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp167/EpicscapeV1/home-1.jpg[/img]
Training area:
What it looks like on minimap
[IMG]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp167/EpicscapeV1/trainminimap.jpg[/img]
Now the three sections of training in training area
Barbarians (low level training)
[IMG]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp167/EpicscapeV1/barbarianstraining.jpg[/img]
Experiments (medium level training)
[IMG]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp167/EpicscapeV1/experimentstraining.jpg[/img]
Skeletal Dogs (higher level training)
[IMG]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp167/EpicscapeV1/skeledogstraining.jpg[/img]
Pkbox
[IMG]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp167/EpicscapeV1/pkbox.jpg[/img]
Teampk (safezone)
[IMG]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp167/EpicscapeV1/teampksafezone.jpg[/img]
Teampk (pk area)
[IMG]http://i408.photobucket.com/albums/pp167/EpicscapeV1/teampkwild.jpg[/img]
Modzone coming soon.. Still coding.. up in a day or 2
[size=16pt]Epicscape V1[/size]
http://files.filefront.com/Epics+V1rar/;12188721;/ http://files.filefront.com/Epics+V1rar/;12188721;/ http://files.filefront.com/Epics+V1rar/;12188721;/ http://files.filefront.com/Epics+V1rar/;12188721;/ http://files.filefront.com/Epics+V1rar/;12188721;/
